fields.description: Optional. Indicates public network solution. If enable, enable public network access of target service with best try. Default is enable. If optOut, opt out public network access configuration.
fields.name: Action

fields.description: Indicates whether to clean up previous operation(such as firewall rules) when Linker is updating or deleting
fields.name: DeleteOrUpdateBehavior

fields.description: Describe firewall rules of target service to make sure source application could connect to the target.
fields.name: FirewallRules
